text:
Bug? Can't set bullet list circle or number styles in default rich text module. In this example, I cannot set the bullet colors with the toolbar. Source code shows that only the list items are receiving the styles, but not the
    tag, which needs the style applied to affect the li::marker items. This applies to font size and other things too. ```
    • ITEM 1
    • ITEM 2
    • ITEM 3
    1. ITEM 1
    2. ITEM 2
    3. ITEM 3
    ```
